Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2S) Master
Stratify OS » Device Interface
Collaboration diagram for Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2S) Master:

Detailed Description

This module implements an I2S multi-master using two GPIO pins and a pin change interrupt. More information about accessing peripheral IO is in the Device Interface section.

Macros

#define I_I2S_GETATTR
 This request gets the I2S attributes.
 
#define I_I2S_SETATTR
 This request sets the I2S attributes.
 
#define I_I2S_SETACTION
 This request sets the I2S action.
